data.question: What is the color of the crystals formed from the reaction of iron(II) formate with formic acid in dimethylformamide at 110 °C?
What is the structure type of the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue?
What phenomenon is observed in the magnetic ordering of the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue at low temperature?
True or False: The mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue exhibits Néel N-Type Ferrimagnetism.
Is the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue similar in structure to Prussian Blue?
True or False: The mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue appears dark-purple when powdered.
What is the ratio of Fe(II) to Fe(III) in the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue according to the Mössbauer spectrum?
What method can be used to prepare pure crystalline samples of the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue?
data.answer: Heating the mixed-valence cluster [Fe3O(CH3COO)6(H2O)3] at 110 °C in a mixture of DMF and concentrated formic acid.

data.question: What is the yield percentage of the black crystals formed by Method A from Fe3(HCOO)6•DMF?
True or False: The intense color of the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue is bleached when dissolved in water or DMF.
What is the maximum wavelength (λmax) of the intervalence charge-transfer (IVCT) band for the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue?
What is the classification of the mixed-valence behavior of the iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue according to the Robin−Day scheme?
True or False: The mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue does not exhibit an IVCT band.
What is the effect of heating the mixed-valence cluster [Fe3O(CH3COO)6(H2O)3] in DMF and concentrated formic acid for four hours at 110 °C?
data.answer: Formation of black crystals in the red solution.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic susceptibility data indicate that Fe(II) and Fe(III) are interacting at room temperature.
What is the residue identified as after heating (Me2NH2)[FeIIFeIII(HCOO)6] at 10 deg/min in N2 atmosphere according to TGA?
What is the space group of the colorless iron(II) formate (1) according to the crystal data?
True or False: The structure of the mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue consists of alternating layers of Fe(II) and Fe(III).
What is the yield percentage of the black crystals formed by Method B from Fe3O(CH3COO)6(H2O)3?
True or False: The mixed-valence iron(II) iron(III) formate analogue exhibits high-temperature molecular magnetism.
